name: Storm Spear
desc:
You hurl a spear of lightning at a target creature within range that you can see, who must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d10 lightning damage.

For the duration of the spell, you can throw a second spear for 2 AP, and a third spear for 2 AP. The second spear deals 2d10 lightning damage on a failed saving throw, and the third spear deals 3d10 lightning damage on a failed saving throw. The spell ends after throwing a third spear.
empower: A successful saving throw deals half damage.
